20110114160740.000|20110114160741.000|CC1|                  WITH US.      
20110114160741.000|20110114160742.000|CC1|         OH.                    
20110114160742.000|20110114160744.000|CC1|         [ horn honks ]         
20110114160744.000|20110114160745.000|CC1|         OH.                    
20110114160745.000|20110114160745.000|CC1|    SEVEN YEARS AGO,            
20110114160745.000|20110114160747.000|CC1|    I HAD THIS IDEA.            
20110114160747.000|20110114160747.000|CC1|    TO MAKE BABY FOOD           
20110114160747.000|20110114160749.000|CC1|    THE WAY MOMS WOULD.         
20110114160749.000|20110114160749.000|CC1|    HAPPYBABY STRIVES TO MAKE   
20110114160749.000|20110114160753.000|CC1|    THE BEST ORGANIC BABY FOOD. 
20110114160753.000|20110114160754.000|CC1|    IN A BUSINESS LIKE OURS,    
20110114160754.000|20110114160754.000|CC1|    PERSONAL CONNECTIONS        
20110114160754.000|20110114160756.000|CC1|    ARE SO IMPORTANT.           
20110114160756.000|20110114160756.000|CC1|    WE USE OUR AMERICAN         
20110114160756.000|20110114160758.000|CC1|    EXPRESS OPEN GOLD CARD      
20110114160758.000|20110114160758.000|CC1|        TO FURTHER              
20110114160758.000|20110114160800.000|CC1|    THOSE CONNECTIONS.          
20110114160800.000|20110114160800.000|CC1|    LAST YEAR WE TOOK           
20110114160800.000|20110114160802.000|CC1|    DOZENS OF TRIPS             
20110114160802.000|20110114160802.000|CC1|    USING MEMBERSHIP            
20110114160802.000|20110114160803.000|CC1|    REWARDS POINTS TO MEET      
20110114160803.000|20110114160803.000|CC1|    WITH THE FARMERS THAT       
20110114160803.000|20110114160805.000|CC1|    GROW OUR SWEET POTATOES     
20110114160805.000|20110114160805.000|CC1|    AND MERCHANTS THAT          
20110114160805.000|20110114160808.000|CC1|    SELL OUR PRODUCT.           
20110114160808.000|20110114160808.000|CC1|    WE'VE GONE FROM BEING       
20110114160808.000|20110114160811.000|CC1|    IN 5 STORES TO 7,500.       
20110114160811.000|20110114160811.000|CC1|    BOOMING IS USING POINTS     
20110114160811.000|20110114160813.000|CC1|    TO MAKE CONNECTIONS         
20110114160813.000|20110114160815.000|CC1|    THAT GROW YOUR BUSINESS.    
20110114160815.000|20110114160815.000|CC1|  I HAD THIS CHRONIC, DEEP ACHE 
20110114160815.000|20110114160818.000|CC1|           ALL OVER --          
20110114160818.000|20110114160819.000|CC1|     IT WAS A MYSTERY TO ME.    
20110114160819.000|20110114160819.000|CC1|   I FOUND OUT THAT CONNECTED   
20110114160819.000|20110114160821.000|CC1|   TO OUR MUSCLES ARE NERVES    
20110114160821.000|20110114160821.000|CC1|       THAT SEND MESSAGES       
20110114160821.000|20110114160823.000|CC1|       THROUGH THE BODY.        
20110114160823.000|20110114160823.000|CC1|     MY DOCTOR DIAGNOSED IT     
20110114160823.000|20110114160826.000|CC1|        AS FIBROMYALGIA,        
20110114160826.000|20110114160826.000|CC1|    THOUGHT TO BE THE RESULT    
20110114160826.000|20110114160828.000|CC1|      OF OVERACTIVE NERVES      
20110114160828.000|20110114160828.000|CC1|       THAT CAUSE CHRONIC,      
20110114160828.000|20110114160830.000|CC1|        WIDESPREAD PAIN.        
20110114160830.000|20110114160830.000|CC1|   LYRICA IS BELIEVED TO CALM   
20110114160830.000|20110114160832.000|CC1|          THESE NERVES.         
20110114160832.000|20110114160834.000|CC1|  I LEARNED LYRICA CAN PROVIDE  
20110114160834.000|20110114160834.000|CC1|       SIGNIFICANT RELIEF       
20110114160834.000|20110114160837.000|CC1|     FROM FIBROMYALGIA PAIN.    
20110114160837.000|20110114160837.000|CC1|  AND WITH LESS PAIN, I CAN DO  
20110114160837.000|20110114160840.000|CC1|  MORE OF WHAT MATTERS TO ME.   
20110114160840.000|20110114160840.000|CC1|       [ Female Announcer ]     
20110114160840.000|20110114160841.000|CC1|   LYRICA IS NOT FOR EVERYONE.  
20110114160841.000|20110114160841.000|CC1|         LYRICA MAY CAUSE       
20110114160841.000|20110114160844.000|CC1|    SERIOUS ALLERGIC REACTIONS  
20110114160844.000|20110114160844.000|CC1|       OR SUICIDAL THOUGHTS     
20110114160844.000|20110114160846.000|CC1|           OR ACTIONS.          
20110114160846.000|20110114160846.000|CC1|   TELL YOUR DOCTOR RIGHT AWAY  
20110114160846.000|20110114160848.000|CC1|        IF YOU HAVE THESE,      
20110114160848.000|20110114160849.000|CC1|   NEW OR WORSENING DEPRESSION, 
20110114160849.000|20110114160849.000|CC1|       OR UNUSUAL CHANGES       
20110114160849.000|20110114160851.000|CC1|       IN MOOD OR BEHAVIOR      
20110114160851.000|20110114160851.000|CC1|         OR ANY SWELLING        
20110114160851.000|20110114160854.000|CC1| OR AFFECTED BREATHING, OR SKIN,
20110114160854.000|20110114160854.000|CC1|     OR CHANGES IN EYESIGHT,    
20110114160854.000|20110114160856.000|CC1|     INCLUDING BLURRY VISION    
20110114160856.000|20110114160856.000|CC1|          OR MUSCLE PAIN        
20110114160856.000|20110114160858.000|CC1|   WITH FEVER OR TIRED FEELING. 
20110114160858.000|20110114160858.000|CC1|       COMMON SIDE EFFECTS      
20110114160858.000|20110114160901.000|CC1|    ARE DIZZINESS, SLEEPINESS,  
20110114160901.000|20110114160901.000|CC1|     WEIGHT GAIN AND SWELLING   
20110114160901.000|20110114160904.000|CC1|     OF HANDS, LEGS AND FEET.   
20110114160904.000|20110114160904.000|CC1|       DON'T DRINK ALCOHOL      
20110114160904.000|20110114160905.000|CC1|       WHILE TAKING LYRICA.     
20110114160905.000|20110114160907.000|CC1|   DON'T DRIVE OR USE MACHINERY 
20110114160907.000|20110114160907.000|CC1|          UNTIL YOU KNOW        
20110114160907.000|20110114160909.000|CC1|     HOW LYRICA AFFECTS YOU.    
20110114160909.000|20110114160909.000|CC1|         I FOUND ANSWERS

20110114161002.000|20110114161005.000|CC1|"TODAY" SHOW WAS CREATED WHEN   
20110114161005.000|20110114161007.000|CC1|DAVE GARAWAY FIRST INTRODUCED

20110114161842.000|20110114161845.000|CC1|         young adults.

20110114161845.000|20110114161848.000|CC1|       children under 18.
